verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H3772>made<s%> with them at <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>summoned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land;<s%>
the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>trials<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders.<s%>

"Yet to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

"And I have <S%H1980>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> your <S%H8008>clothes<s%> have not <S%H1086>worn<s%> out on you, and your <S%H5275>sandal<s%> has not <S%H1086>worn<s%> out on your <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

"You have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have you <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"When you <S%H935>reached<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> us for <S%H4421>battle,<s%> but we <S%H5221>defeated<s%> them;

and we <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it as an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the half-tribe of the <S%H4520>Manassites.<s%>
"So <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that you may <S%H7919>prosper<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"You <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> your <S%H7218>chiefs,<s%> your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> your <S%H2205>elders<s%> and your <S%H7860>officers,<s%> [even] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones,<s%> your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and the <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H7130>within<s%> your <S%H4264>camps,<s%> from the one who <S%H2404>chops<s%> your <S%H2404>wood<s%> to the one who <S%H7579>draws<s%> your <S%H4325>water,<s%>

that you may <S%H5674>enter<s%> into the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and into His <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3772>making<s%> with you <S%H3117>today,<s%>

in <S%H4616>order<s%> that He may <S%H6965>establish<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> as His <S%H5971>people<s%> and that He may be your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you and as He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers, to <S%H1>Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3327>Jacob.<s%>
"Now not with you <S%H905>alone<s%> am I <S%H3772>making<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H423>oath,<s%>

but both with those <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> with us <S%H3117>today<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> and with those <S%H834>who<s%> are not with us <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%>

(for you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> we <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H834>how<s%> we <S%H5674>came<s%> through the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5674>passed.<s%>

"Moreover, you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> and their <S%H1544>idols<s%> [of] <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [they had] with them);

<S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> shall be among you a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7626>tribe,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6437>turns<s%> <S%H6437>away<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> shall be among you a <S%H8328>root<s%> <S%H6509>bearing<s%> <S%H7219>poisonous<s%> <S%H6509>fruit<s%> and <S%H3939>wormwood.<s%>

"And it shall be when he <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H423>curse,<s%> that he will <S%H1288>boast,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'I <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> the <S%H7302>watered<s%> [land] with the <S%H6771>dry.<s%>'

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H5545>forgive<s%> him, but <S%H3588>rather<s%> <S%H227><s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and His <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> will <S%H6225>burn<s%> against that <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H423>curse<s%> which is <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> will <S%H7257>rest<s%> on him, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H4229>blot<s%> out his <S%H8034>name<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H914>single<s%> him out for <S%H9567>adversity<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H423>curses<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

"Now the generation to <S%H314>come,<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H310><s%> you and the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> from a <S%H7350>distant<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> and the <S%H8463>diseases<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H2470>afflicted<s%> it, will <S%H559>say,<s%>

<S%H3605>'All<s%> its <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> and <S%H4417>salt,<s%> a <S%H8316>burning<s%> waste, <S%H3808>unsown<s%> <S%H2232><s%> and <S%H6779>unproductive,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> <S%H5927>grows<s%> in it, like the <S%H4114>overthrow<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H126>Admah<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> in His <S%H639>anger<s%> and in His <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>'

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5921>'Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3662>thus<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>? <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2750>outburst<s%> of <S%H639>anger<s%>?'

"Then [men] shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5921>'Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their fathers, <S%H1>which<s%> He <S%H834>made<s%> with them when He <S%H3772>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H3318>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt.<s%>

'And they <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> them, <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they have not <S%H3045>known<s%> and whom He had not <S%H2505>allotted<s%> to them.

'Therefore, the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against that <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> upon it <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7045>curse<s%> which is <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book;<s%>

and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5428>uprooted<s%> them from their <S%H127>land<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> and in <S%H2534>fury<s%> and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>wrath,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> as [it is] <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>'

"The <S%H5641>secret<s%> <S%H5641>things<s%> belong to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> but the <S%H1540>things<s%> <S%H1540>revealed<s%> belong to us and to our <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> that we may <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>
